messages.message: seeing some strange behavior on a sandbox where our flask services donâ€™t concurrently process requests to the same API (they are  processed 1 by 1) - wondering if anyone knows anything about this? @dlluncor

Following this thread.. same is for api-server apps. For my tests i used an api that contains nothing but two log stmts and `gevent.sleep(4)`. So, theoretically, since gevent.sleep is `cooperative` . It should release control to other greenlets, but that does not happen and i see multiple calls to the same API as sequential.
I also created a gist, just in case, https://gist.github.com/mohit-chawla/b8903906860cdc5c3d4b48ffb6dc3800
